job_title: Registered Nurse in Desert Hot Springs, CA

cons:
Did not have a stable schedule, changed nurses from 12's, to 10's, to 8's within a 3 month period.

Some staff members need continuous further guidance; Management rarely ever educated or offered more training for this staff.

job_title: Dental Team RDA in Riverside, CA
pros: Working hours 8-5 Mon to Fri, medical and dental benefits, great coworkers and providers. They pay mileage if you travel beyond your home base.
cons: This company is a scam. They've been all about money since day one. They claim to help the underserved but in actuality they sign them up for medi-Cal in order to fraudulently bill for services.!With the pandemic and the company’s investigation for fraud, the place is in shambles. Employees are leaving due to no raises in years and also due to mandatory vaccines We were working during the pandemic with no hazard pay. Stay away from this company! They work you hard with no bonuses or raises!

job_title: Customer Service Representative in Riverside, CA

-DECENT PAY

job_title: Medical Records Clerk in San Diego, CA
pros: Good starting pay. Great medical office experience.
cons:
2 stars for the 2 pros listed. After that, this company is a joke. You could be an MA in 1 location only rooming pts and there will be other locations where the MA rooms, does vitals, lab draw and process for pick up, prior auths for rx, supply ordering, pt message returns. And guess what? They will both be paid the same wage! 
There is also so much favoritism it’s disgusting. People with ZERO job experience will get hired at higher wages over someone with years experience only because they have a sister or random cousin in the company. One or two once in a while is bound to happen but this is so over done the company barely functions legally. You’ll get offered an increase and then after 6 pay periods they say “naw, we changed the pay system while we sat on our high paid butts. So you get screwed”. No advancements. No promised raises. No recognition for going beyond your job description because as stated it’s “within your scope”. 
High executives use clinics like personal medical care. They will just walk in or send random neighbors/family members in for treatment with no appt or notice and expect to be seen ASAP before pts with actual appts causing chaos and pts to walk out. 
Nurses and management have no idea what they’re doing so they give their job duties to other employees. Again with no recognition. 
Advice- get your foot in the door, get your experience, then gtfo of this greedy unethical company.
